overview: Jon Lovitz shot to stardum as one of the cast members on Saturday Night Live from 1985 to 1992. His famous idium "Ya Ya that's the ticket" was a pop cultural quote throughout the 80's. Jon Lovitz brings to Showtime the best performers from his own Jon Lovitz Comedy Club, with hilarious perfoances by seasoned veterns; Quinn Dahle, Ian Bagg, Al Del Bene and Daryle Wright. Filmed in front of a sold out audience of 1,800, in San Bernardino.
title: Jon Lovitz Presents
